title: Champs that has gone the longest without a skin
body:
{{champion:69}} Cassiopeia: 1116 days [3.06 Years]
{{champion:56}} ~~Nocturne: 1179 days [3.23 Years]~~
{{champion:78}} Poppy: 1483 days [4.06 Years]
{{champion:98}} Shen: 1010 days [2.77 Years]
{{champion:14}} ~~Sion: 1666 days [4.56 Years]~~
{{champion:50}} Swain: 1371 days [3.76 Years]
{{champion:44}} Taric: 1655 days [4.53 Years]
{{champion:6}} Urgot 1449 days [3.97 Years]
{{champion:83}} Yoric: 1702 days [4.66 Years]

These days are based off of March 14, 2016

Also ik why a lot of these have not have had skins, reworks is the main reason... but still wanted to point this out.

EDIT: added [Years without skin] for each champ
EDIT2: *cries because I don't know how to fix grammar error in title* XP
EDIT3: SION SKIN SION SKIN SION SKIN SION SKIN!!!!

replies.body: Meanwhile Draven gets 2 skins close together...
1 more coming soon,I think its bobble head.
That'd be the {{champion:119}} {{champion:119}}  (Draven Draven) skin.

Meanwhile I see Draven once every 100 games. 
I know they don't do skins based on playrate or popularity (so they say). But it'd be nice for them to spread the love since they also say they have limited employee/time resources.
3 with the one for urf comming soon, but its draven, its his league, its ok XD
the Draven Draven skin is the one comming out for urf

I think Poppy and Shen are in good standing considering that all of their skins, which is a respectable amount, practically look like new anyways. The visual updates were very nice. I imagine similar work for urgot and yorick; I'm excited to see the new looks!
Or, you know, Taric. The one who actually has an officially scheduled rework, unlike Urgot.
can't wait for Taric rework! <3 hope he is hot

> [{quoted}](name=Entropy Aether,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=JpAHXP39,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2016-03-14T19:59:33.333+0000)
>
> can't wait for Taric rework! <3 hope he is hot

I am getting my new codpiece polished as we speak. And when I say I look good, trust me I look goooood; )
Oh yeah, him too! He is literally right around the corner. Much hype.

I swear Cassio got a skin recently.
_\*checks LoL wikia*_
I'm so old. ._.

you could make some really cool skins with her too Q.Q
if she doesn't get a nu wa skin next Chinese new year i will RIOT!
http://imgur.com/zwxte87
Jade Fang was already a Chinese new year thing, right? I doubt they'll give her another skin of the same (general) theme.

> [{quoted}](name=Raa,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=JpAHXP39,comment-id=001200010000,timestamp=2016-03-15T07:03:29.774+0000)
>
> Jade Fang was already a Chinese new year thing, right? I doubt they'll give her another skin of the same (general) theme.

{{champion:62}}
that feel when you're like 'rumble is a relatively recently released champion!'
Urgot needs his star guardian skin
These figures are even more sad when converted into years.  Poppy's the only one on that list I see in games on a regular basis, though.  I see Shen infrequently.

Oh... I should convert these to years :l going to go do that rn
EDIT: done <3 thank you

{{champion:127}} 657 days without a new skin. (1.8 years) only three skins.

Draven gets 3 within a short time span (more skins than most currently have) {{item:3070}}
How about Nami? Don't think she had one for a long time. And I joined in the beggining of S5.
343 days... last skin was urf nami
and diana? or zyra? im just curious for the day stuff XD

Zyra 669 Days, last skin was SKT T1 Zyra
Diana 766 Days, last skin was Lunnar goddess

Also, np its fine to ask <3

> [{quoted}](name=Entropy Aether,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=JpAHXP39,comment-id=000f0000,timestamp=2016-03-14T23:26:44.000+0000)
>
> Zyra 669 Days, last skin was SKT T1 Zyra
> Diana 766 Days, last skin was Lunnar goddess
> 
> Also, np its fine to ask <3

ty very much <3

I want a new Zac skin that they try on, the other 2 aren't bad, but for 1350? That's a bit much for moderate particle change and very LITTLE change visually. I know he's a big blob but they can do it, they've done lots of amazing things visually, so I don't see why they can't make a Zac skin that'd be worth the same amount when converted to another champion.
what about pool party?

I can understand {{champion:44}} and {{champion:83}} since Tarics Rework is right around the corner and are likely busy working on his current skins already and Yorick will be after that, so no point in making a new skin that they will have to rework again right after, but {{champion:14}} {{champion:78}} and {{champion:98}} JUST got updated, there are no currently known plans for {{champion:56}} or {{champion:6}}, while {{champion:50}} and {{champion:69}} likely won't be receiving any model changes any time in the near future, so there really is no excuse for all of them not getting skins.

The thing is that they do plan model changes for {{champion:6}} and {{champion:50}},they know they want to give both of them a big rework(urgot was even planned to come before yorick,but proved to be more difficult).
Its just that they can't work on all the champs at once.
They did say they are giving Swain a new model? can you link me? I dont recall this ever

They said they want to give him a big update similar to that of {{champion:14}} and {{champion:78}},when explaining why swain wasn't one of the 6 mages chosen for the mage-update
http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/de/c/developer-corner/jQmE1EjE-mid-year-mage-update?comment=00060009
90% Sure yorick and taric will get skins with their reworks. Bet they are atleast 1350 RP as well.
90% sure you made this up with no verifiable resources.

90% sure has absolutely no statistical referncing. It is based off of my personal opinion based off of my interpretation of Riot's past actions. Saying "90% sure" does not reference any statistic, statement, or concept of anyone at Riot. It is my own personal opinion, a guess above all else. Let me know what format my citations for my own opinions should be in.
42069% sure all statistics from the internet are real
I don't get it, why is Sion crossed out?
Theres a file on the PBE that says "Mecha Sion Zero"
To be fair, Poppy has a huge number of skins as it is, and all of them got decked out with the rework.
Zyra 669 Days, last skin was SKT T1 Zyra

People were complain about how Zed did not get a skin for 2 years till project Zed, and yet all these champion mains are just silently waiting....
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

I know a skin for her wasn't terribly long ago but I'm still waiting for another {{champion:60}} skin. Two skins is cool but when other champs have over 5 sometimes and the third one to elise is completely unavailable it seems a bit unfair.

Yeah Riot really screwed the pooch giving a Victorious skin to Elise as her first post release skin. I'm glad they didn't do the same thing with Kalista last year who instead received championship instead of Victorious.

There's really no excuse for a lack of Cass skin since RiotRepertoir already confirmed in his dev-corner thread that there won't be any changes to her kit, she's going to keep all of her abilities along with the horrendous passive. 

Merely her Q and E ratios are affected along with some potential numberchanges on her W, and that's it. I don't get why we even have to wait half a year for something that could have been done in an ordinary patch. There's no reason to delay any work on a Cass skin, this is just beyond comprehension. Why does Cass *always* have to the get short end of the stick?

**Also it's been 1131 days since Jade Fang Cassiopeia came out, not 1116.**

http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/03/314-pbe-update.html#more
Confirmed Sion Skin.
Also note that Yorick literally hasn't gotten a skin since release

I have mentioned multiple times that I would love to have a skin that incorporates every color of the rainbow and to call it "Prismatic Taric." It fits it with the gem theme, the gay theme and would look absolutely fabulous!
Sion surprises me considering he had his update a decent bit ago, i figured Rito would have something for him at this point..
Files on the PBE hint at a "Mecha Zero Sion" skin. Possibly even a Legendary.
